  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112216</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112216</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Množenje večjih števil s pomočjo prstov</string>
            <string language="en">Multiplying with the use of fingers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Multiplizieren mit dem Gebrauch der Finger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Se multiplier avec l'utilisation des doigts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Multiplicar com o uso dos dedos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Moltiplicandosi con l'uso delle barrette</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πολλαπλασιασμός με τη χρήση των δάχτυλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El multiplicarse con el uso de dedos</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Vsebina prikazuje postopek množenja števil, večjih od 5, s pomočjo prstov. Predstavitev sem izdelala na podlagi vira, ki sem ga omenila na prvi stani svojega izdelka; natančen naslov je tale: www.mff.org/mmc/tc_muskrat_multiplication.pdf.</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation of multiplication with the use of fingers (suitable for number bigger than 5). Based on the source: www.mff.org/mmc/tc_muskrat_multiplication.pdf</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">množenje</string>
            <string language="en">multiplication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pripomoček</string>
            <string language="en">help</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">postopek</string>
            <string language="en">procedure</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung der Vermehrung mit dem Gebrauch der 
Finger (verwendbar für Nr. grösser als 5). Gegründet auf der 
Quelle: www.mff.org/mmc/tc_muskrat_multiplication.pdf</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation de multiplication avec l'utilisation
des doigts (appropriés à nombre plus grand que 5). Basé sur 
la source : www.mff.org/mmc/tc_muskrat_multiplication.pdf</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação da multiplicação com o uso dos 
dedos (apropriados para o número mais grande de 5). Baseado na 
fonte: www.mff.org/mmc/tc_muskrat_multiplication.pdf</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione di moltiplicazione con l'uso delle 
barrette (adatte a numero più grande di 5). Sulla base della 
sorgente: www.mff.org/mmc/tc_muskrat_multiplication.pdf</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση του πολλαπλασιασμού με τη χρήση των 
δάχτυλων (κατάλληλων για μεγαλύτερο αριθμού από 5). βασισμένο
στην πηγή: www.mff.org/mmc/tc_muskrat_multiplication.pdf</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de la multiplicación con el uso de 
los dedos (convenientes para el número más grande de 5). De 
acuerdo con la fuente: 
www.mff.org/mmc/tc_muskrat_multiplication.pdf</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vermehrung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hilfe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prozedur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">multiplication</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">procedura</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
